ENG_US.infoInitNotification1: Enter a N° up to 2 digits long and press ENTER
ENG_US.infoInitNotification2: Enter a N° between 0 and 9, then press ENTER
ENG_US.infoEnterNotification: Press ENTER to confirm your bet
ENG_US.infoNumber3NotificationMultiples: Enter 3 numbers from 0 to 9 and press ENTER
ENG_US.infoNumber2NotificationMultiples: Enter 2 numbers from 0 to 9 and press ENTER
ENG_US.infoNumber1NotificationMultiples: Enter 1 number from 0 to 9 and press ENTER
ENG_US.infoNumber5NotificationByStep: Enter a number from 0 to 40 and press NEXT
ENG_US.infoBetAmount: Enter a bet value and press CONFIRM
ENG_US.infoReventadoAmount: Enter a bet amount for BUSTED
ENG_US.errorNotificationInvalidNumber1: The number must be a single digit between 0 and 99
ENG_US.errorNotificationInvalidNumber2: The number must be a single digit between 0 and 9
ENG_US.errorNotificationDuplicateBet: This bet has already been made
ENG_US.errorNotificationExcessNumbers: No more than 10 numbers can be played
ENG_US.errorNotificationEqualsNumbers: The digits of the number cannot be the same
ENG_US.errorReventadoBetZero: Betting value for BUSTED cannot be 0
ENG_US.errorReventadoAmountBiggerBet: The amount of BUSTED cannot be greater than the stake value

ESP_AR.infoNumber1NotificationMultiples: Ingrese 1 número del 0 al 9 y presione INGRESAR
ESP_AR.infoNumber5NotificationByStep: Ingrese un N° del 0 al 40 y presione SIGUIENTE

ESP_AR.infoReventadoNotification: Confirme valor de apuesta para REVENTADOS
ESP_AR.infoBetAmount: Ingrese un valor para la apuesta y presione CONFIRMAR

ESP_AR.errorNotificationInvalidNumber2: El N° debe ser de un dígito entre 0 y 9
